places.name: Charminar
places.description: Iconic four-minaret monument and busy bazaar area in the heart of Hyderabad.

places.name: Golconda Fort
places.description: Historic fort famous for its acoustics, palaces, and panoramic views of Hyderabad.

places.name: Chowmahalla Palace
places.description: Palace complex of the Nizams with royal courtyards, halls, and heritage collections.

places.name: Hussain Sagar Lake
places.description: Man-made lake with a giant Buddha statue and lakeside entertainment.

places.name: Salar Jung Museum
places.description: One of the largest museums in India with art, sculptures, and artifacts from across the world.

places.name: Warangal Fort
places.description: Ruined fort with massive stone gateways, carved pillars, and Kakatiya-era remains.

places.name: Thousand Pillar Temple
places.description: Kakatiya temple dedicated to Shiva, Vishnu, and Surya, known for its ornate pillars.

places.name: Bhadrakali Temple
places.description: Ancient hilltop temple of Goddess Bhadrakali overlooking a scenic lake.

places.name: Ramappa Temple
places.description: UNESCO World Heritage Kakatiya temple famous for floating bricks and intricate carvings.

places.name: Laknavaram Lake
places.description: Picturesque lake with a hanging bridge surrounded by forested hills.

places.name: Bhadrachalam Temple
places.description: Famous Sri Rama temple on the banks of the Godavari, major pilgrimage center.

places.name: Papi Hills View Points
places.description: Scenic Godavari river gorge with lush green hills and boat rides.

places.name: Kuntala Waterfalls
places.description: Highest waterfall in Telangana, located in dense forest near Adilabad.

places.name: Pochera Waterfalls
places.description: Wide multi-level waterfall with rocky surroundings and greenery.

places.name: Basara Saraswathi Temple
places.description: Temple of Goddess Saraswathi where children are traditionally initiated into learning.

places.name: Nirmal Fort
places.description: Hilltop fort overlooking Nirmal town, associated with local rulers.

places.name: Nirmal Toys & Arts Center
places.description: Center for traditional Nirmal wooden toys and hand-painted art.

places.name: Medak Cathedral
places.description: One of the largest churches in Asia with beautiful stained glass windows.

places.name: Medak Fort
places.description: Fort overlooking Medak town with bastions, gateways, and history.

places.name: Pocharam Wildlife Sanctuary
places.description: Sanctuary around a lake, home to birds and small animals.

places.name: Yadadri Sri Lakshmi Narasimha Temple
places.description: Hilltop Narasimha temple redeveloped into a grand spiritual complex.

places.name: Bhongir Fort
places.description: Monolithic hill fort with a long ramp and panoramic views.

places.name: Nagarjuna Sagar Dam View Point
places.description: Massive dam on the Krishna river with viewpoints and boating facilities.

places.name: Buddhavanam Project
places.description: Buddhist theme park showcasing stupas, sculptures and Buddhist heritage.

places.name: Nalgonda Hill Fort Area
places.description: Remains of old fort structures with views over Nalgonda.

places.name: Koilkonda Fort
places.description: Hill fort in Mahabubnagar district with trekking trail and gateways.

places.name: Pillalamarri Banyan Tree
places.description: Huge centuries-old banyan tree spreading over several acres.

places.name: Jurala Project Backwaters
places.description: Reservoir with scenic backwaters and small islands.

places.name: Ananthagiri Hills
places.description: Hill station near Vikarabad with forest trails and viewpoints.

places.name: Kotepally Reservoir
places.description: Reservoir popular for kayaking and camping near Hyderabad.

places.name: Khammam Fort
places.description: Fort built on a hillock overlooking Khammam town.

places.name: Nelakondapalli Buddhist Site
places.description: Archaeological site with Buddhist stupas and ancient remains.

places.name: Kaleshwaram Mukteshwara Temple
places.description: Famous Shiva temple located at the confluence of two rivers.

places.name: Eturnagaram Wildlife Sanctuary
places.description: Protected forest along the Godavari with wildlife and tribal hamlets.

places.name: Gadwal Fort
places.description: Historic fort and palace complex of local rulers in Gadwal.

places.name: Jogulamba Temple
places.description: Powerful Shakti Peetha temple of Goddess Jogulamba.

places.name: Domakonda Fort
places.description: Fortified complex with palace structures and village surroundings.

places.name: Sircilla Textile Town View
places.description: Town known for textile and power-loom industry, showing living craft heritage.

places.name: Nagarkurnool Forest Drives
places.description: Rustic forest and countryside drives towards Nallamala region.

places.name: Wanaparthy Palace
places.description: Old palace building of the Wanaparthy Samsthan showcasing local royal heritage.
